snippet: After their season opener had been delayed by Hurricane Sandy, Carmelo Anthony and the Knicks were fueled by the home crowd as they took an early lead against the Heat and never looked back.
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Miami Heat, 104-84, in their regular-season opener.
lead_paragraph: After their season opener had been delayed by Hurricane Sandy, Carmelo Anthony and the Knicks were fueled by the home crowd as they took an early lead against the Heat and never looked back.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony Sets Tone as Knicks Provide New York a Reason to Cheer
headline.main: Anthony Sets Tone as Knicks Provide a Reason to Cheer
headline.print_headline: Anthony Sets Tone as Knicks Provide a Reason to Cheer
